description: Segmentation data of axon innervation and vasculature are mapped onto a generic rat stomach scaffold together with the density distribution of gastrin in the corpus and antrum regions of the stomach. The white-to-green spectrum represents the gastrin density with the green zone signifying higher gastrin level and white zone having lower gastrin level.
heading: Integrated mapping of data on rat stomach

samples.description: Segmentation data of axon innervation used for mapping.
samples.heading: Axon innervation

samples.description: Segmentation data of vasculature used for mapping.
samples.heading: Vasculature

samples.description: Gastrin density used to create fitted field for mapping.
samples.heading: Gastrin density

views.description: View of different types of data integrated on a generic rat stomach scaffold.
